name: Game That I Made II: The Revenge of Smiley Guy
name_original: Game That I Made II: The Revenge of Smiley Guy
description:
Smiley Guy Returns! The long awaited sequel to 2015's flash game 'Game That I Made"

The orange guys took over the galaxy! It is up to Smiley Guy to take it back and save the world!

Enjoy these things this game offers!

  • 5 Intense Levels
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Cutting Edge Graphics
  • Insane Difficulty
